All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractPortfolio
    Abstract Portfolio class that implements Portfolio interface.
    AbstractPriceProvider
    Abstract Price Provider that implements the PriceProvider interface.
    AlphaVantageImpl
    This method extends the abstractPriceProvider and is responsible for providing the price of a particular stock on a given date from the AlphaVantageAPI.
    ButtonListener
    This class represents the button listener implementation of the Action Listener Interface.
    CreateFlexiblePortfolioView
    This class represent the graphical user interface of the creation of flexible portfolio flow.
    DataIO
    This interface provides all the data input and output functionality to the Model.
    DataIOImpl
    This class represents an implementation of the DataIO Interface.
    DollarCostAveragingImpl
    This class implements the strategyExecutor interface and implements the runStrategy method.
    FlexiblePortfolio
    This class represents a flexible portfolio that extends the abstractPortfolio class.
    FlexibleStockDetails
    This class represent the graphical user interface of the flexible input stock details.
    FrameController
    This class implements the IFrameController.
    GraphDisplayView
    This class represent the graphical user interface of the inputs to assist the graph generation.
    GraphResponseWrapper
    A wrapper response class that is used for communication between model and the controller to display the graph.
    IController
    This interface represents the controller part of the MVC architecture of the application.
    IFrameController
    This interface represents the controller part of the MVC architecture of the application.
    IFrameView
    This interface represents the view part of the MVC architecture for portfolio management application.
    IModel
    This interface represents model part of the MVC architecture for the portfolio management system application.
    InFlexiblePortfolio
    This class represents an Inflexible Portfolio.
    IView
    This interface represents the view part of the MVC architecture for portfolio management application.
    LoadPortfolio
    This class represent the implementation of load portfolio functionality for felxible portfolio In this we take a csv file from user and load portfolio upon submission.
    MainMenuView
    This class is the representation for graphical interface of main menu.
    Model
    This class represents implementation of the IModel interface.
    PMS
    This class represents the main class of the program.
    Portfolio
    This interface represents a portfolio, it has all the methods that are required by the model to operate on it.
    PortfolioCompositionSelection
    This class represents the view class for portfolio composition, this will help use user to select from existing portfolios and conduct operation on the selected composition.
    PortfolioDisplayComposition
    This class represent the view implementation to display the composition of stocks and number of shares.
    PriceProvider
    This interface is responsible for providing prices for the stocks on given dates to the Model.
    PurchasedStock
    This class extends the Stock class...and represents a stock that is bought by the user.
    RebalanceView
    This class represents the view class for portfolio composition, this will help use user to select from existing portfolios and conduct operation on the selected composition.
    Stock
    Represents a stock which is internally used by the model.
    StockPercentView
    This class represents the view class for portfolio composition, this will help use user to select from existing portfolios and conduct operation on the selected composition.
    StockPrice
    An entity class that is used for communication between the abstractPriceProvider and its child classes to get the price of a stock on a particular date.
    StockPriceResponseWrapper
    A wrapper response class that is used for communication between model and the controller.
    StockTransaction
    This represents a particular Stock Transaction.
    StockWeight
    This is an entity class representing a stock and its weight, that is required while executing a strategy(single date or dollar cost averaging strategy).
    Strategy
    This is an entity class representing a particular strategy associated with a portfolio.
    StrategyDistribution
    This class is used to give to allow user to enter the stock name/ show the stock name based on the situation (on a date it shows the stock name and on a date range it allows user to enter the stock name) and weightage of the input.
    StrategyExecutor
    An interface that can be used to execute high-level investment strategies for any portfolio.
    StrategyOnDate
    This class is used to get the investment amount, frequency and dates from the user then validate each of the input from user before sending it to the controller.
    TextController
    This class represents the text based implementation of the IController Interface.
    TextView
    This class represents implementation of the IView interface.
    UpdateCommissionView
    This class is used to the display the view in which the user can update the commission of the system.
    Util
    Util class to hold all the methods and variables that are common to many classes.
    Util.TransactionType
    Enum to represent the type of transactions supported in the application.
